response.overview: Through observing the landscape and models of cohabitation between living and non-living entities, Croatian experimental filmmaker Ana Husman, examines the ways in which memories are built and narratives formed. And also how they disappear and fragment. A caring cinematic homage to female members of Husman's family, as well as to Lika, a neglected, sparsely populated region from where they originate.
response.title: I WOULD RATHER BE A STONE

titles.title: I WOULD RATHER BE A STONE
